member.summary: Left-to-Right (Non-European or non-Arabic digits).

member.summary: Left-to-Right Embedding

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.LRO

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.R
member.summary: Right-to-Left (Hebrew alphabet, and related punctuation).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.AL
member.summary: Right-to-Left Arabic

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.RLE

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.EN
member.summary: European Number (European digits, Eastern Arabic-Indic digits).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.ES
member.summary: European Number Separator (Plus sign, Minus sign).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.ET
member.summary: European Number Terminator (Degree sign, currency symbols).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.AN
member.summary: Arabic Number (Arabic-Indic digits, Arabic decimal and thousands separators).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.CS
member.summary: Common Number Separator (Colon, Comma, Full Stop, No-Break Space.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.NSM
member.summary: Nonspacing Mark (Characters with the General_Category values).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.BN
member.summary: Boundary Neutral (Default ignorables, non-characters, and control characters, other than those explicitly given other types.)

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.B
member.summary: Paragraph Separator (Paragraph separator, appropriate Newline Functions, higher-level protocol paragraph determination).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.S
member.summary: Segment Separator (tab).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.WS
member.summary: Whitespace (Space, Figure space, Line separator, Form feed, General Punctuation spaces).

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SkiaSharpHelper.Portable.RTLCharacters.ON
member.summary: Other Neutrals (All other characters, including object replacement character).
